doc.title: Flesh for the Beast 2
doc.plot: A recently demoted police detective, Jimmy D'Amato, becomes obsessed with a beautiful but naked 'Jane Doe' who literally drops dead on his desk at the precinct station. Cryptic and gruesome clues lead Jimmy to an old private mansion where strange activities take place. Jimmy gets swept up in a maelstrom of carnal perversion and supernatural evil and gets much more than he bargained for.
